segments.text: The scene opens with sunlight on the counters.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Woman drying a plate, serene expression.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Suddenly, water gushing from the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's flooding over, drenching the front.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her shoe's wet, but she keeps polishing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Boy on stool, cabinet doors wide.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Cookie jar within grasp, he's triumphant.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the tilt of the stool worries me.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Girl's open hand, full of hope.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Cabinets getting soaked, what a shame.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This drawing tells a story of neglect and fun colliding.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't look away from the potential fall.
segments.speaker: PAR
